articles.title: Oil Prices Top $100, Yet Some Big U.S. Frackers Let Their Production Fall
articles.description: The largest U.S. shale-oil producers are returning more cash to investors than they’re investing in drilling, a sign of how much the industry has changed since the oil-boom years.
